title: Odd or Even Game
description: Ask user for numbers repeatedly and tell if it's odd or even. Allow exiting.
requirements: Use a loop to continuously ask the user for a number.
Check whether the number is odd or even using the modulus operator.
Exit the loop when the user types 'exit'.
Print appropriate messages for odd/even and exit.
starterCode:
# Use a while loop to keep asking for numbers
# Use % to check odd or even
expectedOutputExample:
Enter number: 5 → Odd
Enter number: 8 → Even
Enter number: exit → Bye!
